front.title: Applying Cryptographically Generated Addresses to Optimize MIPv6 (CGA-OMIPv6)

abstract.t: This memo suggests a new and enhanced route optimization security mechanism for Mobile IPv6 (MIPv6). The primary motivation for this new mechanism is the reduction of signaling load and handoff delay. The performance improvement achieved is elimination of all signaling while not moving, and 33% of the per-movement signaling.
